ARIP-R.BK.summary: ARIP Public Company Limited engages in the management of events and marketing activities in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Media and Contents, Management of Event, and Digital Service. The company sells and distributes advertising spaces and services on traditional media, digital media, and online social media in the fields of business, management, and information communication technologies (ICT), including Business+, a magazine that provides analysis on the economy, business, management strategy, administration, marketing, and business trend updates; Business+ Top 1000 Companies, a magazine that compiles business information of the registered companies in Thailand to list the top 1,000 companies with the highest revenue; and COMTODAY or techhub.in.th, an ICT and consumer electronics knowledge source. It also organizes IT exhibitions and trade shows, as well as offers comprehensive event management and integrated marketing services service for conventions and exhibitions under the COMMART name. In addition, it offers digital marketing and consultant services, such as online marketing strategy, branding communication through digital media, online communication strategy, content marketing strategy, creative content, online content management, data analytic and reports, and online media plan and buying media, including achievement measurement; and enterprise learning platform, an online training platform using cloud technology. Further, the company engages in the production of e-books, advertisements, and content in digital media; production and distribution of IT-related publications; and placement of advertisements. ARIP Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

GSC.BK.long_name: Global Service Center Public Company Limited
GSC.BK.summary: Global Service Center Public Company Limited provides customer support and collection services in Thailand. It offers call center, customer service, technical support, telemarketing, and telesales and collection services for phone, computer network, and other telecommunication systems. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

K-R.BK.summary: Kingsmen C.M.T.I. Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in interior design and decoration, and exhibition businesses in Thailand. It offers retail and corporate interior services, including retail interiors, roll-outs, retail fixtures, corporate interiors, and restaurants; exhibitions and event services, such as custom-designed stands, official shows, pavilions, suites and chalets, and rental services; thematic and museums comprising theme parks and attractions, galleries and visitor centers, and museums; and event management services. Kingsmen C.M.T.I. Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

OTO-R.BK.short_name: ONE TO ONE CONTACTS PUBLIC COMP
OTO-R.BK.long_name: One to One Contacts Public Company Limited
OTO-R.BK.summary: One to One Contacts Public Company Limited primarily provides customer contact center services in Thailand and Cambodia. The company operates through two segments, Outsourced Contact Center Services and System Maintenance, and Turnkey Total Solutions. It offers tele-survey, tele-sales, follow-up, direct mail, customer care, order taking, complaint handling, technical support/help desk, payment reminders, direct marketing support, campaign management, data entry and data Cleansing, feedback, and marketing management services. The company also provides contact center setup, solution design and integration, software application development, project management, and maintenance services; in-house and on-site rental of information service center and contact center equipment for organizations to enhance business operations; telemarketing management services for financial and insurance services; and training, preparation, and program enhancement services for staff development in various levels for contact center service operations. In addition, it offers outsourced customer service representative services comprising management and recruitment of customer relation staff, including selection, training, monitoring, and quality control to maintain the standard of services; and personnel replacement and staff welfares. Further, the company offers hosted contact center system solutions; and business process, customer service, and marketing and sales outsourcing services, as well as technology innovation solutions. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

QLT-R.BK.summary: Qualitech Public Company Limited provides technical services testing, and inspection and certification services for operation safety of industry equipment, pressure vessel, industrial boiler, piping, and steel structures in Thailand and internationally. It offers safety engineering service, non-destructive testing, destructive testing, mechanical and metallurgical testing, inspection and certification, plant inspection, and tank cleaning services, as well as consulting services for engineering safety. It serves oil and gas, metal manufacture/importer, fabrication and construction, power generation, and tank and terminal industries. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

SLP-R.BK.summary: Salee Printing Public Company Limited provides label printing services in Thailand, Myanmar, and internationally. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Pathumthani, Thailand. Salee Printing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Salee Industry Public Company Limited.

SLP.BK.summary: Salee Printing Public Company Limited provides label printing services in Thailand, Myanmar, and internationally. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Pathumthani, Thailand. Salee Printing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Salee Industry Public Company Limited.

SO-R.BK.summary: Siamrajathanee Public Company Limited provides various outsourcing services to public and private sectors in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Outsourcing Services and Rental Services. The company offers personnel management services, including drivers, office workers, and technicians, as well as Academy, a professional driver training course; Valet parking, a parking service; Drive4U, a private chauffeur service; and training services. It also offers car rental services; Mr.Journey, a shuttle van for wheelchair users; online document management systems; data recording, invoice registration, and scanning services; landscape management; and tree trimming services. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand.

SO.BK.summary: Siamrajathanee Public Company Limited provides various outsourcing services to public and private sectors in Thailand. It also offers car rental services; Mr.Journey, a shuttle van for wheelchair users; online document management systems; data recording, invoice registration, and scanning services; landscape management; and tree trimming services. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand.

TBSP-R.BK.summary: TBSP Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells security documents in Thailand and internationally. It prints annual reports, coupons, gift cards, share certificates, commercial cash coupons, postal stamps, postcards, passbooks, cheques, continuous forms, brochures, one-part mailer, payroll slips, and other commercial documents; and debit and credit cards, membership cards, gift cards, contact cards, contactless cards, dual-interface cards, ID cards, transportation cards, biometric cards, plastic, and display cards. The company also offers information, document, and security management solutions; smart office platform; smart label products, such as track and trace solution, a data tracking system to manage and track the delivery process of the supply chain; product inspection and authentication system; and other products in the field of smart factory, Internet of Things, and augmented reality. In addition, it provides document solutions management services, such as document management, forms, printing consultancy and design, manufacturing, purchasing, provision, quality control, database storing, product delivery, destroying important documents, and list making, as well as services related to stationaries and other equipment. The company was formerly known as Thai British Security Printing Public Company Limited and changed its name to TBSP Public Company Limited in June 2019. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand. TBSP Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of T.K.S. Technologies Public Company Limited.

TKS-R.BK.summary: T.K.S. Technologies Public Company Limited manufactures and sells continuous paper forms, securities printing products, and other printing and continuous labels primarily in Thailand and internationally. The company's products include digital print and mail forms, cheque on demand forms, warehouse management forms, advance forms, business forms, office papers, plastic cards, and flexible packaging products, as well as security form products, such as cheuqe, passbook, examination paper, security document, coupon, and gift voucher. It is also involved in the provision of information technology and software consultancy services, and warehouse and logistics management service. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.
